title: The merry cuckold Who frolickly taking what chance doth befall, is very well pleased with wife, hornes and all. To the tune of, The merry cuckold.
publisher: Printed by the assignes of Thomas symcock,
notes: Place of publication from STC, which has publication date 1628-1629.
In two parts; woodcut illustration at head of each part.
Reproductions of the original in the British Library.
